column4: i repeat, please someone can help me, i would like detect my card(dlink wlan g650), which was detected by gutsy, and now after the upgrade, hardy don't detect it, i checked the blacklist file...etc! wtf :( ?
no idea, it happened to my b43 based wifi too
i suspect the new version of madwifi, warning your b43 is blacklisted by defaut ;)
i know, i had to install fwcutter package to reenable it
